snippet: Iraq has agreed to buy 28 Czech-made military airplanes in a deal worth $1 billion, part of a broader Iraqi effort to rebuild military capabilities, officials said Friday.
abstract: Iraq agrees to buy 28 Czech-made military airplanes in $1 billion deal, part of broader Iraqi effort to rebuild military capabilities destroyed during the American-led invasion.
lead_paragraph: Iraq has agreed to buy 28 Czech-made military airplanes in a deal worth $1 billion, part of a broader Iraqi effort to rebuild military capabilities, officials said Friday.

headline.main: Iraq: Deal to Buy Czech Planes
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Deal to Buy Czech Planes
